org.jasig.cas.support.oauth.web

Class DefaultAccessTokenGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.oauth.web.DefaultAccessTokenGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccessTokenGenerator

    @Component(value="defaultAccessTokenGenerator")
public final class DefaultAccessTokenGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccessTokenGenerator
    This is DefaultAccessTokenGenerator. Creates access tokens by appending the ticket granting ticket id to the request service, and decodes requests as such. The separator between the id and the service is considered to be UserProfile.SEPARATOR.
    Since:
    4.2.0
